name: John von Neumann
fields: Mathematics, physics, statistics, economics, computer science
workplaces: University of Göttingen University of Berlin University of Hamburg Princeton University Institute for Advanced Study Los Alamos Laboratory
alma_mater: Pázmány Péter University University of Berlin ETH Zürich
thesis_title: Az általános halmazelmélet axiomatikus felépítése (Axiomatic construction of general set theory)
academic_advisors: László Rátz, Gábor Szegő, Michael Fekete, József Kürschák, David Hilbert, Erhard Schmidt, Hermann Weyl
doctoral_students: Donald B. Gillies, Israel Halperin, Friederich Mautner
notable_students: Paul Halmos Clifford Hugh Dowker Peter Lax Benoit Mandelbrot
awards: Bôcher Memorial Prize (1938) Navy Distinguished Civilian Service Award (1946) Medal for Merit (1946) Medal of Freedom (1956) Enrico Fermi Award (1956)
